entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 02:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -28.7°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -33.4°C
Wind: NW 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
